HomePage.title: Image Color Replacement Tool
HomePage.description: Free online tool for professional image color replacement. Replace multiple colors simultaneously, batch process images, and maintain quality. No upload needed - process locally in your browser. Perfect for designers, marketers, and content creators.

ColorReplaceSettings.title: Color Replacement Settings
ColorReplaceSettings.emptyState: No color replacement rules. Click "Add Color Pair" to start

ToolDescription.title: Free Online Image Color Replacement Tool
ToolDescription.mainDescription: Transform your images instantly with our professional color replacement tool. Perfect for designers, marketers, and content creators who need to change image colors quickly and efficiently. Whether you're creating product variants, adjusting brand colors, or experimenting with design options, our tool provides precise color manipulation while preserving image quality - all directly in your browser, with no upload required.

features.title: Professional Features for Image Color Editing

feature1.title: Smart Color Replacement Technology
feature1.description: Replace any color in your images with pixel-perfect accuracy. Our advanced color matching algorithm ensures smooth transitions and professional-looking results, perfect for product photos and design assets.

feature2.title: Multi-Color Replacement
feature2.description: Save time by replacing multiple colors simultaneously. Ideal for brand color updates, theme changes, and creating product variations. Add multiple color pairs to transform entire color schemes at once.

feature3.title: Efficient Batch Processing
feature3.description: Process multiple images simultaneously with our powerful batch processing feature. Perfect for e-commerce product photos, marketing materials, and large design projects. Save hours of manual editing time.

feature4.title: Professional Color Selection Tools
feature4.description: Use our precise eyedropper tool to pick exact colors from your images. Compatible with hex codes and RGB values, making it easy to match your brand colors perfectly.

feature5.title: Advanced Color Matching Controls
feature5.description: Fine-tune your color replacements with our intelligent similarity controls. Perfect for handling gradients, shadows, and complex color variations while maintaining natural-looking results.

feature6.title: Secure Local Processing
feature6.description: Experience fast, secure image processing right in your browser. No file upload needed - your images never leave your device, ensuring complete privacy and instant results.

ToolDescription.privacyDescription: Your privacy and data security are our top priority. Unlike other online tools, our image processor works entirely in your browser - your images are never uploaded to any server. Work confidently knowing your sensitive design assets stay private and secure on your device.

example1.description: Replace multiple colors simultaneously by adding multiple color pairs.
